statements.sql: select `A`.*, `B`.`slug`, `B`.`title`, `B`.`meta_seo` from `seos` as `A` left join `seo_languages` as `B` on `A`.`id` = `B`.`seo_id` where `B`.`language` = 'vi' and FIND_IN_SET('publish',A.status) and `A`.`link` = 'http://localhost/laravel/begreen/gio-hang/add' order by `A`.`priority` asc, `A`.`id` desc limit 1
hints: Use SELECT * only if you need all columns from table
